title: Board Game-Based Role-Play Simulation for Collaborative Analysis Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental collaboration skills and proficiency in mathematical problem-solving
context.additional_context: Building real-time collaborative data collection and analysis environments using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can analyze qualitative indicators of collaborative dialogue through board game-based role-playing
Learners can evaluate connections between dialogue content (What) and methods (How) in collaborative processes using voice data
Learners can visualize collaboration metrics collected in simulation environments to diagnose team performance
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
